O Sancte Baphomet,
Coruscans in oriente,
Signum justitiae in omni terra,
Et hieroglphyphum arcanorum mundi invisibilis:
Exalta mentes nostras cordesque sapientis luce,
Mane in nobis in tenebris profundissimis,

Et eleva nos mortales in altum:
Gloria et laudes sempiternae tibi,
O Baphomet fortissime,
Baphomet potentissime,
Baphomet doctissime.

Ave Baphomet ❤

item.title: One-Eyed Jack
item.description:
Pin-It
This guy's been complete for a while but I'm only just finally uploading him! Meet One-Eyed Jack. Technically he's not complete yet since he needs his scythe, but that's going to be a 3D printed piece once we finally get the printer up and running.

This was made for a very good friend of mine from old days of playing Ragnarok Online. His character had a little Baphomet Jr pet that was kind of a jerk. He only has the one eye, which is why he's got that leather eye patch!

I used minky for the main body and the horns, faux fur for the ruff around his neck, and leather for the patch itself. I'm actually really pleased with how this came out. Especially the horns! Now I just need to make sure he doesn't murder me in my sleep, which is something entirely possible when I remember this character!

item.title: Pretty in pink, sure, but isn't this too much?
item.description:
Pin-It
Woah! Look! Such pink! Much cute! Very fluffy! Wow!

I really wanted to catch one of the cats up in one of the Japanese cherry trees again, but the weather has been bad and I've been a bit too tired to make an effort.
However, one day the weather cleared up and I pulled myself together, grabbed the camera and started to stalk the cats, very eager to make them climb the biggest cherry tree, like: "Plz, plz climb the tree!?"
Did they though? Of course not.  

The only reason why I finally got any cheery blossom pictures at all was because Felix for some reason chased Tintin up into the tree (picture of that here: Up, up into the pink cloud!  ) and I had to hurry, hurry and climb the nearby fence to get up high enough to reach into all the flowers so I could take pictures.
Tintin was kind enough to stay still for a while. Goooood kitty and, yes, so pretty in pink.
 
This is the same Japanese cherry tree as in these photos.

What a difference a little bit of spring and warmth does, huh?
The photo on the right with Felix is some years old and I didn't shoot in RAW back then. I think it shows. Yay for improving!



  Camera Data
Model: Canon PowerShot SX60 HS
Shutter Speed: 1/160 s
Aperture: F/4
Focal Length: 5 mm
ISO Speed: 100
Original resolution: 4608 x 3456 px
Edited and cropped with Camera Raw 8.7 and Photoshop CS6

item.title: MUST. CLIMB. NOW.
item.description:
Pin-It
Felix and his HUGE eyes are so cute, I think.
Just look at those ferocious claws! Every time I see them I'm happy he's such a kind kitty because he could surely make a bloody mess of me if he wanted. But he won't because he's a sweet little monster.

This picture was very much a lucky shot. I was actually preoccupied with Tintin (sitting on top of that pole Felix wanted to climb) and then I heard Felix do his typical "Mr-r-r-r-r-r-ew!" close to my feet and when I looked down there he was. I turned the camera down and snapped a shot (this one) and then he was gone again, lightning fast.  
If I'd had more time to compose the picture I would have liked to get a little more "air" above the ear at the top of the picture, but since I didn't even have time to think I'm just happy I managed to get both ears in a sharp picture.


Camera Data
Model: Canon PowerShot SX60 HS
Shutter Speed: 1/125 s
Aperture: F/4.5
Focal Length: 11 mm
ISO Speed: 100
Original resolution: 4608 x 3456 px
Edited and cropped with Camera Raw 8.7 and Photoshop CS6
^(Since I like to submit PNGs rather than JPEGs and I've gotten questions about my camera I thought I might add this section in the future.)

item.title: sorry.
item.description:
Pin-It

I was walking outside with a friend at 3am in the morning when I saw her. Being a feline lover, I couldn’t resist but show my love. When I was going back home, she followed all the way back like a puppy. How can I ignore that.. I took her home.  She suffered from Gangrene and vet had to make her sleep, before the virus could spread all over her body and make her paralyzed. She was already suffering. I had her for 3 weeks, and I will never forget how being a stray/abandoned cat she became so close to me from the very first day. She was not like an usual cat. 

I used to call her Oreo. 
another photo :  fav.me/d8wh39i

item.title: Devil
item.description:
Pin-It
[Within Temptation - Let Us Burn]

__________________________________

The darkness has come to the roses
The fire is reaching the air
The colours that I have created
Are suddenly flying away

I'm not fighting myself, will not follow
'Cause my choices are mine, it's my fate
And I'll never bow down from the sorrow
I'll face all that is coming my way

Denying the devil of silence
Embracing the world on the edge

Let us burn
Let us burn
The night in the skies here tonight
Let us burn
Let us burn
In this fire that makes us yearn
We're fighting our fear of the silence
We're running through walls where they stand
Let us burn
Let us burn
Let us burn

__________________________________

Meh. I don't like Tigerstar, so please excuse the ugliness... Anyway, after I started with a Mapleshade close-up () I decided to make a Dark Forest cats series of this. So have a Tigerstar.

item.title: [DEVIL DROP] tiger lily + progress video
item.description:
Pin-It
watch the video by clicking here!



Devil Drop [Urban/Fantasy/Action/Dramedy]
During the Second Prohibition, man-made magic (colloquially referred to as "Devil Drop") has been outlawed. Of course, this doesn't stop people from getting their hands on it! Meet Sweet, a wanted man who is one of the very few able to use magic naturally–and happens to have a power greatly sought after by the people in power in an awfully corrupt city.

--

more devil drop art, this time just of tiger lily (his magic is the ability to make cash and coins explode with the snap of his fingers)
If you'd like to keep up with updates as soon as I finish them, including character concepting, sketches, world/story information, and even previews of the script, you can do so by supporting me on Patreon! While most everything, save for some story information and the script previews, will be uploaded publicly after some time, you can see them first there (as well as get some other goodies, like monthly Patron-only requests and adoptables)!

Devil Drop is a story I'm currently working on! It takes place in the not-so-far-future where magic exists (both artificial and natural). Natural magic users, often referred to as "lefties" among other things, have a lot of prejudice against them because of which. While the general law is that they are to wear a certain device that will make their magic unusable, it's very common for them to be arrested for crimes they didn't commit or even killed. "Devil Drop," the man-made liquid magic that provides an assortment of powers for varied lengths of time (as well as some mental stimulants, close to a high) is illegal, but remains popular with many of those so against lefties and anyone in power. Devil Drop is often sold in speakeasies, though the really good stuff is reserved for anyone who can afford it and not to get caught.

item.title: Devil bitch
item.description:
Pin-It
 I updated my personaaa.

I really like how it came to be. I might post a version without the effects but i'm not entirely sure bout that yet.
I feel much more comfortable with her character now, i mean, she's supposed to represent me so i think it's a bit important for me to feel comfortable with it-
I treat her like a normal OC almost.

Some info:

   -Real name is Vendetta Von Wicktrick.
   -Alias is Trickster Wicked, which came about when she was younger. Loved to cause mischief and play tricks on people, so she gained the name 'Trickster'. She liked the name and enjoyed the ring of Wicked Trickster, so she took that, reversed the words, and now is locally known as such.
   -Dislikes being called by her real name.
   -Born in a small secluded place of the Underrealm.
   -Loves all forms of art.
   -Is of type of Demonic Devil.
   -Has Devil Corruption, a native trait to her species, scattered about her body.
   -The purple flame has an unknown origin, like the stitching.
   -The flame is always seen illuminating from her right eye, even when it's closed. Her eyes are usually a silvery blue-grey, but her right eye is 'stained' purple from the flame. Despite what it's called, it isn't really a flame at all. If you come in contact with it, it will actually be cold and numb that part of your skin for a couple seconds. (She's immune to it's symptoms due to the fact it belongs to her)

There's a bunch more information on her, cause like i said. She's like a normal OC. (But she isn't) Even if i have to give my characters a backstory/info of sorts, or else they won't feel complete, and they won't be considered my baby yet.

Hope you like.
Everything belongs to me.

item.title: Devil's Day 2015
item.description:
Pin-It
This is almost an art piece that never was x_x
TWICE my art program crashed, and twice the file corrupted, and I lost everything I had been working on, in that version of the picture.  
The first time it happened, I had been painting for about four hours; with a modified version of the sketch, that I had saved no where but on that corrupted file.
Thankfully I had been working on it via livestream, so in order to regain my sketch I took a screenshot of the saved video, and enlarged it. The sketch was horrible quality, but it was better than nothing. I then had to start painting over again from scratch.
And... the second time the file corrupted I was about 5 minutes from being finished, and had pull up an older version and put 3 more hours of work into it to regain (again) what I had lost.

Devil's Day indeed. Sebastian, you've put me through hell, I hope you're happy!

It took 20 hours from start to finish, to complete this one.

Close Up Version:
Tumblr Post: reapergrellsutcliff.com/post/1…

Art (c) Me
Sebastian Michaelis/Black Butler/Kuroshitsuji (c) Yana Toboso

item.title: A Devil's Deal
item.description:
Pin-It
Your husband was a cruel and wicked man. He was a jealous and possessive man who wore you on his arm as a dazzling trinket. A man of devious and malicious intent that sickened the souls and fortunes of all whom he touched. For his life of sin and treachery upon which he built his fortune he made a deal with the Devil. By spending his ill gotten gains and blood soaked riches you have, however unwittingly forged a black mark upon your soul. By those very riches that he bought first your hand, then your obedient blindness, he has damned your once fair soul and schemed to lay claim to you once again from the putrid abyss of Hell itself. For all his depraved and wicked audacity the Devil has granted him one last wish. For the Devil craves your soul, and your husband desires your flesh.

item.title: YB: Muto Shiba
item.description:
Pin-It
   


" You can never put a bell on my neck, but if you want, I'll let you have a little taste of me ♪ "


| P E R SO N A L   D A T A |

☢ Name: Muto Shiba
☢ Nickname: Silver (Shi-ba-), doggy shiba (shiba inu)
☢ Gender: Male
☢ Height: 5'8"
☢ Weight: 126.663 lbs
☢ Age: 17
☢ Birthdate: November 25th
☢School Year: 3rd year
☢ Gang: Wakarimasen
☢ Rank: F
☢ Yan: 20
☢ Voice Sample: Tachibana Shinnosuke
☢ Theme Song: Laugh Away



| C H A R A C T E R I S T I C | 

☢ Battling style:
                Said to be a fan of peace, this young man's face is rarely seen in battle fields, but the main reason for that is just because he hates to hurt himself. The man preferred to play the role of the gang's strategist due to his quick wit and canny scheme ideas, but frequently gets dragged into battle by his comrades in the end. Reason is, regardless of his intelligence, Shiba also owns a great span of stamina and flexible footwork like a cat's, which is his main weapon. However, instead of using for attacking, it is primarily use for evading purpose, if not playing chase with his opponents or retreating from battles. Nonetheless, Shiba loves trying new tactics of battling and often thinks of delinquents battle as a game, but when he is finally put in difficult state (usually happens in close combat battle), there's always the old kick-and-run tactic, or cheating as an alternative, and sometimes suggestive movements in his shelf.


        
☢ Personality:
| Free-spirited | Mysterious | Contradictive | Playful | Egoistic | Sly | Optimistic | Competitive | Childish | Lustful |

                An actual free-spirited teen who more or less lives in the moment and does whatever he desires in his life. The man always have a smile on his face, accepting every consequences of his actions lightly. Though he has plans for his future, he never considers it seriously and more often than not, ends up doing them spontaneously. Shiba does things according to his way, and despite favoring math at school, he pins no logic in his life and lives by the word 'infinite'. A lot of people might be unable to comprehend his way of thinking and probably reckon this as reckless instead, but he yearns to reach the impossible in life, and is very positive that by being unshackled by rules, he can achieve anything.
                Regardless his overoptimism, he can still be very negative towards general things. Through his past experiences, he sees forming relationships as a relatively easy thing and is only a useless act of two or more needy people who are desperate for attention gather together and hang out. Thus is why Shiba always reminds himself not to get too close with his gang members. It may appear as if his world revolves only around him and his friends, and he admits that the time he spends hanging out with them is 'fun', but he doesn't wish to go further than that. In reality, his world only consists of himself. Egoistic as he is, he feels the most comfortable when he does short-term relationship, for example like the usual one-night-stand relationship he has with strangers. 
                Inspite of his two-faced individual, Shiba is still a 17-year-old teen. He enjoys good ol' sitcoms, reading magazines, slacks off boring classes and plays pranks on his friends. He's overall well-liked by his friends and the teachers due to his friendly and laid back nature. He also has his share of childish moments, for example when losing his cool in video games, not wanting to share his food, etc. 



☢ Likes:
✓ Kitties
✓ Math and Chemistry
✓ Playing his accoustic guitar
✓ Sex
✓ Games
✓ Comedies
✓ Freedom

☢ Dislikes:
✘ Iguanas
✘ Work
✘ Literatures and Home Ec
✘ Cold weather




 | B A C K G R O U N D | 

☢ History:

                Shiba is the only child of Hideki Muto, a widely known politician and Eri Muto, a retired news broadcaster lady after the birth of their son. Shiba spent most of his childhood lifetime without the figure of his father, and on contrary was much closer to his mother and the house maids. His father was concerned at first, as he knew he had too many business to manage, he couldn't find a time to spend with his son. Shiba got used to this lifestyle after a while, ergo even until now he didn't feel the least connected to his father. The father himself reckoned that since he couldn't give his son his time, he had at least provide him a mother and the best environment to grow up in.
                Believing that his child should be better than the rest, young Shiba was later brought into the finest public school at early age and was shoved with private lessons only from the qualified private teachers. Indeed, he became smarter than the kid around his age, but the mother was worried that he might be in too much stress. She couldn't contact her husband to discuss about this matter for a long time, therefore she made a decision to cut off all the lessons. She started to take her son to anywhere he wanted to go in order to take a break from the days he spent studying. Shiba was even transfered to a normal public school where the lessons were far easier than his previous school that he started to slack off.

                One day when the father managed to find a time to go home, he received a phone call from school he didn't recall getting Shiba into, reporting that his grades had started to slip recently and he had been absent frequently. A big fight soon followed between the couple as the husband found out what his wife did and said that she had made a stupid decision. The wife later blamed the father for being unreasonably egoist and irresponsible, while the husband threw those exact words right back at the mother. Young Shiba saw his parents' fight and took his mother's side, as he believed his mother did the right thing, and soon enough started to dislike his father.
As Shiba grew up, the couple was even more distant, but they started to pour more affection to their child, seeming to be competing with each other for Shiba's attention. His father started taking his son to his workplace, introducing young Shiba to political world, but he was the least interested. His mother stayed at home, always there to converse with whenever he wasn't keeping his father company. Soon, his father got into an affair, and Shiba immediately saw through this.

Shiba started to grow a sarcastic tounge from that moment. He saw his father's marriage as something very fragile, and the fact that he could easily get a woman because of his status made Shiba detested human relationships even more. There was one time when one of his father's women openly complimented his son's face, and, Shiba determined to give his father a little change of pace. He decided to mess with them. One after another, sooner or later all of them fell for his 'innocence' which he acted out on purpose. In the end, they all preferred him to his father, and all of them left his father's side.

                From there on, Shiba had lost track of days. His life, his future had been planned all along. He could have anything he wanted, and living had became boring. He didn't have to do anything all. His daily life consisted of waking up in a luxurious room, eating prestigious dish that tasted like sand as time passed, going to school where everyone stared at his status when talking, having sex with whoever came on him, and then back to sleep. It was boring. That was the one time he did something that actually felt right to him- coming to a street called Shimokatazawa. No one knew his identity there, and he oddly felt welcomed. He started smoking and drinking illegally and no one cared, and at a time he actually found out that he was bisexual. 

                Once, he actually went home early, and was soon greeted with a slap. Both his father and his mother were home, his father holding a bundle of photos with an enraged expression. Shiba smiled an odd victorious smile, seeming to understand what it could possibly contain even without his parents telling him. They were putting the face of anger and shame, and at the same time -- disgust. Their own son was disgusting to them. Shiba laughed at the thought, and watched his father lashing off curses at his son as his mother covered her face, unable to look at his only child. Shiba soon retorted his father, revealing all his father's actions regarding how many women his father had done with and who all of them were. Both his parents were shocked- and they fell silent as they looked at each other. Perhaps they were too shaken up to the point where no argument could be held. Shiba took the photos containing him and one of his father's woman messing around and threw it away to the dustbin, before he packed up a few of his stuffs and eventually left the house for good.  

                Using the money he had made during his time in Shimokatazawa, he rented a small apartment room and moved to his current school. He felt much better now, the air he breathed no longer try to suffocate him and he could 'actually' do anything. He later got into Wakarimasen without his knowing (he first just thought that he was making friends) but after time passed he acknowledged himself being a member of the gang. Though some may say that CI might be more suited for his persona, he loved Waka's laid back atmosphere and didn't bother checking other gangs.

TLDR; basically his status as a politician's son was discarded after he did something shameful and soon after moved out to a cheap apartment to get his ticket to freedom. He performs music in Shimokatazawa and pick up 'clients' to earn money. He later joined a gang in his high school because he gets intrigued by the idea of it.



☢ Trivia:
○ An atheist
○ Frequently wanders around Shimokatazawa after a disguise to fit in to meet up with some "friends".
○ Only smokes when very stressed because he still treasures his lungs.
○ One of his turn-on is having his ears or his nape bitten.
○ Purrs when his chin is stroked.

○ Black leather wallet with cats' photos in it

Rodent Characters

I have social media accounts too if you want updates when I post new pictures or start new voting rounds!
Twitter twitter.com/LordFriez Tumblr lordfriez.tumblr.com/

Intermission Coloring
----------------------

I had already liked Shiba Inu's, before the Doge meme.

lolsnaps.com/upload_pic/Trying…

So I decided to make a character around the idea, which darkeralan was happy about.

Also I wanted to state that although I really like cats, I like quite a few breeds/species of canines, which is apparent in alot of my OC's for my comic-story.
Enjoy~

item.title: NEO JAPAN 2202 - PHANTOMS
item.description:
Pin-It
New piece for Neo Japan! 

"Invisible Ops aka Yurei aka Phantoms/Ghost, is a a project funded by the Royal Police, a project that focuses on producing stealth units, equipped with cloak-capable fabrics and often covered in dark colors. They are built to specialize in stealth missions. The units are controlled using a hive system, by an A.I called Tsuki, which is one of the oldest and the earlier model of A.I developed, this enables the unit to operate with extreme accuracy, precision and synchronization, much efficient that its human counterpart. "

Here you can see an early experimentation and prototype version of the Yurei in a field test, with retractable active camo-tape from its head. 

Looking forward to the final version of these guys!
Edit: The tapes are of course for now, are for aesthetic purposes, I wanted to show the bot more than the tape right now, so this wont be as practical in the final version, i can assure you that at least
Edit 2: Looking for ideas for a next tutorial, it'd be great if you can let me know your thoughts or any ideas!
Tutorial Ideas, anyone?Hey guys! Been awhile since I've updated my journal, here are some status updates:
The book for Neo Japan 2202 is on hold for now, due to personal reasons and I didn't want to rush it out, and I'm working on another book right now so I gotta make time for that first. The book will be announced in a couple of months time, it's gonna be a collaboration with a lot of great artists so hang tight!
I'll drop anymore updates about the book if there's any, so for now I'm gonna keep posting snippets of Neo Japan from time to time. 
So main topic:
Thank you guys so much for the views! You guys are the best I've been reading the comments and sorry I havent gotten to reply them, i'll do so soon! Rushing some projects recently so be kind D:

item.title: The Mothers
item.description:
Pin-It

Every night at 2 am.


Loss is the one shared quality prevailing in all of those who are taken before their time. But with that loss comes the caveat of something that was had, something worth celebrating. The dead are remembered and in keeping all the lessons taught they remain assured of the finality of death and mournful of it.

But this is not always so.

Few, in their life long fit of stagnation, develop an inner rage. A hatred of themselves and of others so white hot that it prevails beyond entombment. The seething envy of what was long desired but never had fuels their soul to rise as a ghastly husk with newfound power over the living. In death they seek to claim what artifacts and persons they could never have in life. But they are bound by otherworldly rules such that even with an ability to claim what they will they can never have enough to satiate the unbearable need. They become more bold, more dangerous and with growing numbers they claw and tear like starved dogs all for but a moment of respite.

--

They set sights upon this house one week ago and each night since under the cover of snowfall they have invaded. Without sound, not a scratch or gust of air they drift through the walls in search of her son. This activity will continue indefinitely until both mother and child are sucked dry of all life and will to care. She knows this because it has happened before. This town is intertwined in the goings on of unnatural creatures, things that exist outside our realm yet have a vested interest in its functions. Most of the people here are unknowing pawns drawn in with the promise of long life and ample food and drink entirely ignorant that what is given is not a gift. There are a select few who in their own potentially miss-guided efforts are here to pursue interests of their own.

“Do not take my child!” someone must have cried in the face of losing their kin to the nightly raids, to pass the burden along. Admittedly those of a lesser fortitude should be driven mad by the spirits’ horrid consistency and in such case is it not reasonable to do any and all one can to protect those they love? Regardless, she had endured so much to keep him hidden as all who live in this place must do to guard what they value most. She is no saint, she would not sacrifice herself to better her moral stance, taking onus to satiate these spirits with her own blood. Passing on a curse only secures ones position for it to return some day with considerably more terrifying force. She had always thought highly of her ability to suffer at great cost in favour of even greater benefits and this is one such situation. The dead reside in parts unknown and if coaxed with the right bait they can become unwitting pawns themselves.


“One and all, ghosts evoke a less dignified existence than those of maggots, so do not pity them. They are all but waste fit only for the harvest of their gullible, putrid hearts.”

item.title: B5 Kudu Twins
item.description:
Pin-It

The sun had begun dipping below the horizon as Jon dropped his pack and perched on a jutting rock formation. The sky turned a deep red orange as the clouds rolled in dumping heavy rain upon the landscape. The river which marked the border of the reserve gleamed like a vein of hot silver off in to the distance in the last rays of the sun. Jon pulled out his binoculars and began surveying the landscape. As he observed from his position his two partners strode up behind him. 2 Kudu bull drones, Anengoni and Buumi, took up position behind him and began surveying the expanse sweeping with their sensors while networking with other drones in the area.

A rash of poaching had occurred in the area near the river. There were no access roads nor villages near this section of the park and the crocs did a great job of deterring would be poachers from crossing the river. This was not enough to deter all poachers though and recently a handful had succeeded. Jon gave them credit for braving the crocodiles but his admiration stopped there. Calling in his arrival to Ranger HQ he settled in and watched the sun set. His night patrol was about to begin and he would need his wits about him. The Bush held many surprises for both friend and foe alike.

–
Kudu Drones. While formidable in appearance Kudu drones are typically used for reconnaissance and observation. Theirs horns are long and can pierce most body armor, drone armor, and thin vehicle plating but they will only engage in combat as a last resort. Swift, graceful, and alert they are the perfect eyes and ears for any ranger or research operation.

item.title: Fun and Games. Pt. 9
item.description:
Pin-It
Standing back up, the boy slowly walked around her.  Barbara's eyes followed him.  "Are you hurt Mrs Summers?" he said.  She shook her head.  Again she tried saying "Help me....untie me"  "I don't know what you are saying...what..what is it?"  Barbara repeated it and to emphasize, she started to struggle, rocking on her side, trying to lift her body and moving her arms up and down and side to side as far as they would go.  She twisted her hips and wriggled her legs.  Philip watched her transfixed.  He could hear the T.V. in the living room and now the rustling sound of her clothes as she struggled.  His mouth was dry.  Dropping down by her side, he put his hand across the tape that was covering her mouth.  Barbara stopped struggling.  "Shhhh....shhh....no....no!" His heart was beating harder.  The only sound coming from Barbara was her labored breathing though her nose.  Getting up, he turned and carefully walked over to the living room, occasionally glancing back at Barbara.  Pushing the door open slightly, he peered in.  Will was laying on the couch, asleep.  The football match was still on.  Turning, he walked back towards the kitchen.

He sat down on the floor next to her. "You...you...you are very beau.....beautiful, Mrs. Summers." he said embarrassingly.  He moved closer to her face and sniffed.  "You smell good to!" he said smiling.  Barbara gave a little snort, twisted her arms up and moved her wrists back and forth.  Philip moved his hand across her waist and held her wrists by the rope.  He looked back at Barbara. "Did a bad man tie you up?" he said.  Barbara shook her head.  "Did Will tie you up?"  She shook her head again.  He let go of her wrists.  'He's not going to untie me!' thought Barbara.  "Oh god, he's not going to untie me.  The little shit!"  The boy then turned his attention to the ropes around her waist.  Pressing up against her, he traced each one of them with his fingers and saw how they secured Barbara's arms to her body.  Next he examined her legs. "That's lot of rope!" he said.  "That's more than on my favorite magazine!" he thought, comparing Barbara to the model on the cover of a Detective Magazine that she looked at when she and Will had come over to his house.  He pulled at the strands of rope that were tied above her knees and felt how tight they were.  Heart still pounding, he placed his hand on her thigh, feeling the soft nylon of her tights.

to be continued......

item.title: Fun and Games. Pt. 7
item.description:
Pin-It
Barbara stopped moving and looked at the phone on the wall.  It rang one more time then stopped.  She could hear Will in the living room talking to someone over the noise of the television.  She couldn't make out what he was saying.  Suddenly he yelled: "Philip is coming over to watch the match! His telly has gone all wonky!"  "Philip? Oh no!...not Philip!" Barbara yelled in her head. "Oh!"

 Philip is a big kid, nice, a little slow, but a nice kid.  Always willing to help and all, but the problem was that he had a serious 'crush' on Will's mum.  There was an incident last year when Phil was caught by his parents looking at Barbara getting dressed from his room with binoculars.  Also, since the family moved in, clothes would mysteriously go missing from neighbors washing lines, mainly women's underwear.  Barbara had some items, tights and a couple of pairs of knickers, disappear from her line as well.  Word got around and from then on, he was known as 'Phil the Peep!'  Barbara felt he was harmless but she generally did not encourage him.  Often he would show up in the afternoon in their driveway and open the car door for Barbara after she had picked Will up from school.  At first she thought that it was a nice gesture but after a while she noticed that he only did it if she had left for the office that day dressed in a skirt, or short dress.  He was never there on days she wore pants.  She just chalked it up to boy hormones.

Shortly after they had moved in, Barbara and Will were invited over to Phil's house by his parents.  They seemed nice enough.  His father had done a lot of remodeling and was eager to show off his work.  Will was 'wowed' by Phil's room. He had an extensive collection of American Super Hero Comics, some quite old.  As Barbara wished that Will's room was bigger, Will, who was by the side of Phil's bed, suddenly said: "Are these comics?"  Barbara looked down.  Will had pulled a small stack of old magazines out from under the bed.  They were Detective Magazines.  She reached down and picked one up.  Official Police Detective.  It was from the 70's.  The cover showed a woman in a floral dress laying on the floor of a cabin, bound and gagged.  She looked at the others on the carpet and they too showed images of women tied and gagged.  Flicking through the pages, the stories all seemed to be about murder and robbery from years ago.  The feature story on this one was about a sex orgy that ended in murder.  For that story they had a black and white photo of another women tied to a chair and gagged.

"Philip," said Barbara, "Does your Mum let you read these?" turning to Will, she told him to put the magazines down.  "N, no Mrs Summers." said Phil. " These are my Dad's and...and must have got mixed up with mine w...w...when we were unpacking."  She looked at the boy who was now pushing them back under the bed.  She felt that he wasn't telling the truth.     

Now though, with that recollection, she was worried.  She can't let him see her like this.  She tried calling to Will though the gag.  It's was no use. He couldn't hear her.  She decided the best thing to do was to continued to inch her way to the living room and have Will untie her before he got there.

to be continued..........

item.title: Fun and Games. Pt. 6
item.description:
Pin-It
As she struggled, Barbara was getting more and more frustrated that she was unable to free herself.  This was not like playing tie up when as a teenager she used to babysit the kids next door.  She could always get out of their 'string' games. But this was more.  This kid Andrew, knew what he was doing and he made damn sure she wouldn't be able to escape.  She decided that the only thing she can do would be to get herself into the living for Will to help.  Even that was going to prove difficult.  Going to sit up, she lost her balance and rolled back over on her side.  Trying again, she lifted her arms as far as the ropes around her body would allow and once again she slipped over onto her side. This time she tried to worm her way in sideways, pulling her legs up and using her right foot and the palm of her right hand to push herself. Being on the polished kitchen tile floor made it hard going.  Concerned about modesty, she would stop and pull down her suit dress only to repeat the process again as she inched along.  As she got closer to the carpet, the phone on the kitchen wall suddenly began to ring.

to be continued.......
item.author: NoAuthor

item.title: Fun and Games. Pt.8
item.description:
Pin-It
Slowly and carefully Barbara continued to move closer to the living room and freedom.  She knew that Phil was on his way over and this caused her to try and move a little quicker.  Suddenly, the unmistakable sound of the back door opening caused Barbara's stomach to tighten. She quits moving and turns her head as Phil walked into the kitchen and stopping him dead in his tracks.  He looked down at his friend's mother.  He looked at the tape covering her face, the ropes that were bound around her arms and legs.  He saw a run in her nylons that went from her ankles, all the way up her leg.  He just stood there, frozen, looking.  His heart began to pound, wondering what happened.  He swallowed  hard.  Is this real or a game or a joke?  How did this happened?  Did Mrs Summers do this, or did Will?  He wanted to know.  
 
Barbara kept eye contact with him and slowly and carefully, used her hands to pull the hem of her dress down.  Phil watched her do it.  She was wearing one of his favorite outfits.  She wore it to work a lot.  It was it was a little short and tight.  He liked that.  "Mmelff muh!" said Barbara.  The boy leaned forward and carefully slid his fingers under the rope that was across her chest and around her arms.  He pulled on it and felt it give a little give. "Help me." Barbara tried to say again.  Phil could smell her perfume as he straightened up. "You smell nice Mrs. Summers." he said.  Barbara didn't take his eyes off him. "Please help me." she repeated.  

Ignoring her, he walked over to her ankles and crouched down next to her legs.  Barbara instinctively covered her backside.  This was like one of his fantasies but it was real!  Philip trembled as he looked at her bound feet.  He saw the toe nail polish, a gold toe ring and the strappy high heel shoes she was wearing.  He saw a fine gold chain around her one ankle, under her tights.   Phil touched the rope that was tied around Barbara's ankles.  It too was snug.  He looked closer at the ladder in her stocking and traced his finger along it.  Barbara did not change her position as she felt him run his finger up her leg and thigh, pushing his hand under her dress, the hem sliding up to her hip.

"That's a bad one!" said the boy. "It goes all the way up!  I don't think you can fix that!"

to be continued......

item.title: Fun and Games. Pt.10
item.description:
Pin-It
She was wearing this same outfit the day he waited for her to pull into her driveway.  He had watched her get into her car that morning from his bedroom.  He looked as she opened the car door, sat on the seat, swung her legs in and saw the way her dress slid all the way up to her lap. Before she closed the car door, Philip's dad, who was in his driveway yelled: "Morning Barbara!  Beautiful day, yeah?"  She turned to look at him at the same time quickly pulling the hem down. "Yes lovely!" she replied as she closed the door.  That same day, Philip went and hid behind the privet hedge near her driveway, forty minutes after getting home from school.  He didn't have to wait long.  Barbara's MGF pulled up.  Unnoticed, he quickly moved to the drivers door as Barbara started to get out.  She had her right leg out of the car when she stopped and turned to get her purse off the floor on the passenger side.  Phil just stared between her legs at her silky white underwear that was in full view under her tights.  Turning she saw the boy and clamped her knees together which restricted the view a little. "Whoops! Woo woo!" she said as her face went red. Will climbed out of the car.  "Hi Phil!  Want a lolly?" he said.

That was two weeks ago but fresh in his mind.  He realized he was so thirsty. "Mrs Summers....do you mind if I....." he started to say then stopped.  Why was he asking her if he could get a drink?  She couldn't stop him.  She couldn't stop him from doing anything.  Barbara saw a trace of a smile across his lips then watched him get up and walk towards the fridge.  Her side was hurting.  Closing her eyes she managed to roll over on her back.  Her legs were starting to get numb and achy. She had to do something.  Phil closed the fridge door and turned around to look at Barbara, a larger in his hand.  She watched him as he sat down by her feet.  Drawing her legs up, she started to wiggle her feet to get the circulation going.  Phil put his beer down and grabbed her ankles.  "No...no!" he said.  She didn't stop. "Untie me now!" she tried saying and she struggled to to move her feet and legs.  Philip held on to her ankles and she was surprised how strong he was.  She kept flexing her legs up and down and from side to side, feeling the circulation coming back up until the point that he wrapped his arms around her knees, stopping her.

to be continued.......

item.title: Fun and Games. Pt. 5
item.description:
Pin-It
Barbara's eyes slowly opened.  Her head was hurting as was her right hip.  She felt sick as she lifted her head up off the floor an slowly stretched her legs out.  The sound coming from the living room when the spectators roared, made her head pound even more.  Will popped his head around the door. "Okay Mum?" he said as the noise of the crowd suddenly increased causing him to look quickly at the TV then rush back into the living room.  This was getting a bit too much.  She had to get free.  The ropes that bound her were not painfully tight at all and actually there was quite some give to them.   She again stretched out her legs and started working them back and forth hoping that the knots would start to loosen.  Nothing.  She tried her arms, twisting her shoulders and pulling them up, trying to move her wrists to her side.  As she did, she could feel the cords around her waist and upper body tighten.

item.title: Aftermath
item.description:
Pin-It
They were gone now, taking with them the rest of the furniture and electronics that belonged to her ex-husband that she had put on Craig's List before listing the house with the Realtor.  She now lay on the master bathroom floor having being brought there by the man who had tied and gagged in the empty bedroom.  She was no longer frightened.  They kept their promise that she wouldn't be hurt.  What the hell was she thinking after agreeing to meet them at the house after work.  Now it was too late.  As she lay there, the late afternoon light streamed in across the bathroom floor.  They must surely have gone though her purse and taken her cell phone, so the only thing left do was to get herself down the stairs, out of the house and over to one of the neighbors.  This was going to take a while, she thought to herself, but then again, she had no other plans that evening.

item.title: Fun and Games. Pt.11
item.description:
Pin-It
Barbara was breathing hard though her nose.  The cloth in her mouth was heavy with saliva but she was unable to get her tongue behind it to try and push it against the tape covering her face.  Twisting her body slightly, she moved her arms as far as they would go to one side so she wouldn't be sitting on her hands.  Philip had let go of her legs and was crouching next to her, sipping on his beer.  He looked her over. "Whoever tied you up used a lot of rope Mrs Summers!  I don't think you could ever get out of that!" he giggled, taking another sip of beer and shaking his head. "Maybe I'll help you a little and then you can try?"  Barbara 'snuffed' a sigh of relief.  "Finally!" she thought to herself. 

Grabbing her ankles with both hands, he pushed her legs back and then tried to pull on a loose end of rope that bound her ankles together. Unable to grab it from the front, he pushed her legs over to the side making Barbara wince.  Plilip's eyes traced the shape of her legs and the curve of her thighs.  He could see how the ropes dug into her thighs and how the knots that cinched them were at the back.  Crouching again beside her, he started to work on the cords that were tied above her knees.  "Anything...anything you can do" thought Barbara as she felt his hands on her.  The hem of her outfit had ridden well up her thighs but she was past the point of caring and anyway, what could she do?  After he had unlooped the cinch, he lifted her legs as he unwound the rope above her knees.

"Try now Mrs. Summers!" he said.  "What did he mean by that?" she thought, looking at him.  "Try and escape now!" he said as he slid the rope away from them. "Oh..I get it....he's going to untie me bit by bit until I can get free!" she thought. "Okay..I'll play along!"  Sliding her legs down she struggled for a few seconds.  Watching her, he took another sip of beer. "Uhhhph!" she said shaking her head.  Once more grabbing her legs, he again pushed them over on one side and worked his fingers on the knot of the ropes that bound her thighs.  Occasionally, as he worked on the rope, his hand would brush up against Barbara's most sensitive area, sending a dull electric like thrill, through her body.

item.title: Fun and Games. Pt.12
item.description:
Pin-It
Now, only the ropes around Barbara's ankles and the rope under her knees remained.  "Try again!  Go on Mrs Summers!" Philip said.  With the rope around her thighs gone, Barbara had some more movement in her legs but there was still no way she could get loose, still, it was obvious to her that the boy was enjoying seeing her struggle.  She would do like he asked and play his game if he would get to untie her.  Moving closer, Philip put his hand on her thighs where the ropes had left marks. "Does this hurt Mrs Summers?" he said, gently stroking her thigh.  Barbara nodded slightly.  Slowly he started to massage her legs and tried to slip his hand between them but the rope that was tied under her knees, made it difficult, so Phil started to untie it.  Barbara felt some relief as now just her ankles were bound but was concerned the way she was being lightly groped by him.  The boy finished the last of his beer.  Standing back up, he went over to the fridge and took another larger.

"Try now!" he commanded as he pulled up a kitchen chair.  Barbara had to try again for him but this time she changed her position as she was getting sore.  She turned on her other side, away from the boy.  She had a lot more movement in her legs as she struggled again, but not enough to slip out of the ropes that were still tight around her ankles.  She used her arms the best she could to draw attention to Phil that maybe he could take off some of the ropes there, however the boy's attention was fixated on the back of her legs.  He watched how the hem of her dress, move and ride up her backside as she struggled, showing more and more of her snug white cotton knickers under her tights.  He liked the the way they arched up high on her hips.  Barbara was aware that he was watching her, like some of the men at work.  Even though she missed being with her husband, she enjoyed the attention.  She wondered what they would make of this though, especially Gary, in finance, who she had often fantasized about.  She wouldn't mind being tied up by him and just the thought of it now was getting her slightly aroused.

Phil took a long drink on his beer amd moved off the chair and lay down beside Barbara.  She immediately tried to turm on her back but he stopped her.  He sniffed the hair on the top her head as his hand touched the tape that gagged her.  With his cheek against hers, he looked down the front of her dress at her cleavage.  He could see part of her bra.  Reaching down he ran his hand over the tops of her breasts causing her to struggle slightly, which made them jiggle.  "Do you want to escape Mrs Summers?" he said.

item.title: Shifting Reality
item.description:
Pin-It
Source to Consciousness - Shifting Reality, 2009

Do you remember your first scream, your birth, your first breath?


___________________________________________________________

"...Because No Sun Melts Me, the Light, the Freedom, the Ruin"

___________________________________________________________
"Blood and sweat shall not longer be a host to my aura
So my lifeless shell falls into hot dunes
And coalesces with what it was built of"
Dunkle Macht wächst in mir
-Hellebarn, Nagelfar
___________________________________________________________

I'm but a shell. A frame of a man. I'm but a glimpse of whom I used to be.
I'm no more life and lust.
I'm only rich on time to spend venting my own spleen.
I'm sick as hell. I am in desperate need of heeling.
Need to feel salvation. Or I might as well embrace death.
I could never stand a world of sin and fornication.

The world is full of whores. All this filth and heresy.
I am a tool of the Lord. I have eternal life.

The will of God was executed through my deeds.
The voice of God I heard. All filth and unclean I
disintegrated to prepare Gods paradise in this world.
I read the holy writings. I read Matthew's 18th chapter,
7th, 8th and 9th. And I realised what had to be done.
And that I just had so little time.

The world is so full of sin. Blasphemy and sacrilege.
For as I believe in him. I have eternal life after death.

What have I done so wrong. Why have they put me in this
place without no windows. I'm no more life and lust.
I'm only rich on time to spend venting my own spleen.

The world is so full of fools. Vagrant souls and lustful flesh.
But as I believe in him. I have eternal life after death.
Bathory:Schizianity

item.title: Super Squad - Warhammer 40k style (by athos01)
item.description:
Pin-It
Done by . This is basically my vision of the squad in the Warhammer 40k universe.

----
A juggernaut of justice. That's what comes up when the Imperial Guard and the Space Marines work together. Not even Ork hordes can stop them.

And that's the case here.

Sharpy is a commissar, tasked with keeping ponykind's soldiers in good order....by force if necessary. Though he was given a sword as a melee weapon, he was also granted a special 'rocket pistol' firearm for ranged attacks. He packs a special pistol to execute any soldier who retreats, carrying in his heart the belief that only in death does duty end.

Len wanted to join the Vindicare Temple as an assassin, but seeing as how their arrogant behaviour didn't suit her, she joined the Ordo Hereticus as an inquisitor. Her mission: burn heretics and traitors with her pocket flamethrower, take them down with her mini-crossbow, or slice 'n dice them with her energy dagger. She can switch between standard, electrifying, incinerating, and explosive bolts for her crossbo

Rainbow Dash is an Ultramarines assault marine sergeant who leads assault marines into battle. Assault marines descend upon their foes with their jet packs, knocking them out before closing in to engage them with chainswords. Rainbow, however, makes a spectacular sonic rainboom when's he lands, shredding her enemies while providing fellow marines with temporary invulnerability. She also packs melta bombs for anti-armor combat.

Soarin embodies the wrath of the Imperium of Ponykind. He was a Devastator marine before being ascended to the position of Terminator, and later to Terminator sergeant. He wields a special assault cannon (with bayonet) that fires energy salvos instead of live ammunition, and shoulder-mounted rocket launchers allow him to bombard targets behind walls or further than the assault cannon's reach. He also carries a heavy flamer into battle, further increasing his effectiveness.

So....yeah.XD I know I went a bit off with weaponry, but that's me.XD
----
Sharpy and Len are mine.
Soarin and RD (c) Hasbro.
Art by Athos01.

item.title: Warhammer Tarot
item.description:
Pin-It
So, after a long time working on this project it has been finished in february this year... Some words are required: This Tarot deck is a fanart project containing references to work from Games Workshop's Warhammer Fantasy stuff as it was designed for one of my WHFRPG characters, :thumb192023429:

The whole story: Years ago i wanted to practice female anatomy (still need to^^), and also we created a new set of WHFRPG characters. For a Dark Heresy character i had a Tarot as he was a prophet and used it during the sessions and i thought it was really cool and added to the atmospheere, so it would be even cvooler to have an individual Tarot deck with Warhammer iconographics and stuff^^ So i gave Vincent a fitting background story, had all the cards sketched out within i think six weeks and it was fun playing the character with a real Tarot
For some years the sketched cards lay dormant until last year i thought it would be a good practice to finish them, and here we go! If you have any questions, want a higher resolution or so, just ask away

item.title: Welcome to Ativa -Warhammer 40, 000
item.description:
Pin-It
For 0.7 seconds, a small sun burst into howling life in the heart of Ativa, crown jewel of Kuvis.

It burned retinas, shattered lenses, drove augurs-servitors into machine-madness and turned millions to dust, blasting rockcrete to ash and plasteel to molten waste. It carved a blazing eye visible from orbit and even the Warp with pure atomic fusion and the death-scream of an entire city. Within hours of the city's destruction, the resistance launched a massive counter-offensive and took the scattered Imperial forces by complete surprise, effectively routing them. The planetary government is in ruins, loyalist forces are all but destroyed, and the planet begins descending into shadow.

A glimmer of hope emerges from the rubble.


A commission for . It's been a long time since I put this amount of effort into a single piece, yet it's as smudged and unclean as ever.

Addendum: I did not trace this. Referred to The Last of Us, but no tracing. I don't like tracing, makes me feel even more untalented than I already am.

item.title: The Mothers
item.description:
Pin-It

Every night at 2 am.


Loss is the one shared quality prevailing in all of those who are taken before their time. But with that loss comes the caveat of something that was had, something worth celebrating. The dead are remembered and in keeping all the lessons taught they remain assured of the finality of death and mournful of it.

But this is not always so.

Few, in their life long fit of stagnation, develop an inner rage. A hatred of themselves and of others so white hot that it prevails beyond entombment. The seething envy of what was long desired but never had fuels their soul to rise as a ghastly husk with newfound power over the living. In death they seek to claim what artifacts and persons they could never have in life. But they are bound by otherworldly rules such that even with an ability to claim what they will they can never have enough to satiate the unbearable need. They become more bold, more dangerous and with growing numbers they claw and tear like starved dogs all for but a moment of respite.

--

They set sights upon this house one week ago and each night since under the cover of snowfall they have invaded. Without sound, not a scratch or gust of air they drift through the walls in search of her son. This activity will continue indefinitely until both mother and child are sucked dry of all life and will to care. She knows this because it has happened before. This town is intertwined in the goings on of unnatural creatures, things that exist outside our realm yet have a vested interest in its functions. Most of the people here are unknowing pawns drawn in with the promise of long life and ample food and drink entirely ignorant that what is given is not a gift. There are a select few who in their own potentially miss-guided efforts are here to pursue interests of their own.

“Do not take my child!” someone must have cried in the face of losing their kin to the nightly raids, to pass the burden along. Admittedly those of a lesser fortitude should be driven mad by the spirits’ horrid consistency and in such case is it not reasonable to do any and all one can to protect those they love? Regardless, she had endured so much to keep him hidden as all who live in this place must do to guard what they value most. She is no saint, she would not sacrifice herself to better her moral stance, taking onus to satiate these spirits with her own blood. Passing on a curse only secures ones position for it to return some day with considerably more terrifying force. She had always thought highly of her ability to suffer at great cost in favour of even greater benefits and this is one such situation. The dead reside in parts unknown and if coaxed with the right bait they can become unwitting pawns themselves.


“One and all, ghosts evoke a less dignified existence than those of maggots, so do not pity them. They are all but waste fit only for the harvest of their gullible, putrid hearts.”

item.title: Wendigo
item.description:
Pin-It
Commission for
I was so happy to being able to draw one of Shark's characters, since I've always loved her designs sooooo freaking much omg! This guy is no exception, he's one of my fav from her and man, I really enjoyed to draw him! I'll paste a part of his information, from his reference, so you guys will understand what's going on ;'D

"Why can't I keep my dolly, papa?" she asked her father, tears swelling in her eyes. The father threw the well-kept dollies into he pit of the fire, and wailed a wretched response, "because the boogeyman is coming...!"

The wendigo can teleport to any place within reason, and he does so through children's dolls to silently gain access to homes. Family's without children are generally safer (but not completely safe) than the rest. The beast will emerge through the doll itself to make for an easily grabbed child owner. Once he has manifested a body through teleportation, he can not do so again until killed. Often, the beast will brutally take it's own life (break his own neck, sever his own head, etc) if need be to teleport once again. (Sharkfu's words)

That's it!!
I hope you guys enjoy it! And omg, make sure to check out her galley man, you won't regret! *v*
Wuv u all <3

item.title: I can be good...
item.description:
Pin-It
Using this drawing I’d like to answer to some people’s doubts who criticise Jason for his beauty. Sometimes people say “If he’s a creepypasta character, why is he handsome? A creepypasta character must scare you,not fascinate you!”
I agree with that, but this depends on the tastes of people as well.
For example, Jeff the killer is a psychopathic assassin with burned and disfigured face, but despite this there are people appreciating his appearance. There are people who love the Puppeteer, Eyeless Jack, Slenderman, Dollmaker, Candy pop etc. instead other people can’t see their physical appearance and terrifying.
There’s a reason if Jason is “handsome”. Jason uses his beauty to buy the people’s trust, but everyone knows his true appearance.
How many people would approach the toy maker if they saw his rotten arms? So this is the reason why Jason has a pleasant appearance, but in the end … what does change?

How many people did you meet in your life who hurt you despite their friendly appearance? Sometimes the appearance doesn’t count at all.

But it’s different when I’m not able to make terrifying Jason’s face when he’s mad. x)

item.title: Robin
item.description:
Pin-It
A quickish speed painting to get me back into the swing of things. Quite influenced by Anthony Jones in this one, (still waiting on that copy of Heaven's Hell!) as I've been watching a lot of his awesome Gumroad Tutorials on painting with more confidence, thinking about design, composition and getting the most out of your time. With them you also get his tool presets and brushes, which I've started experimenting with too - there's still so many techniques in Photoshop to explore. Experimentation is always a good thing, and I think I need to do more of it in future. Pretty happy with how this guy turned out, let me know what you think!

This Sunday I'll be at  Collector Zone Toy & Hobby Fair selling some art, should be a fun day so come say hi if you're in the Perth - Joondalup area. And cheers for all the faves and comments recently! I don't have time to reply to every single one sorry but they all get read and are really appreciated. Also have been doing a bit of rebranding at the moment and replacing the "LordNetsua" with "Austen Mengler" online. So now I've got a new email, deviantART, Twitter and Tumblr handle - you should still be able to reach me through the old addresses, but apologies if it causes any confusion. Alrighty, better get back to it, cheers!

item.title: Maniac WereSmile -Y.C.H Commission -HOLD-
item.description:
Pin-It
EDIT: No more offers on this one please, I am in the process of choosing from those already offered. Thank you all for the interests though!

What will the price be for this commission?
My usual prices! (commission prices can be found on my main profile page, under my art status)
Since this is a Headshot/ Bust image, here are the prices;
-Polished Bust sketch, colored, shaded, whatever BG?- $25
  -Fully outlined Bust , colored, shaded, whatever BG? - $35
I'm not adding the prices for BGs, so I will determine how much detail I will be putting into the BG. So. BASICALLY, free background! Won't be super detailed, but yeah. LOL.
My BGs can run from $5, $15, $25+. 
And it will be Cel shading, nothing too over the top.


I am thinking of raising my prices of commissions soon. Just wanted to throw that out there.

Well... I was going to hold off uploading this one. But why not just upload it now, eh? Basically, it's a werewolf /wolfbeast /werebeast/werething with a huge maniacal smile going on. Why? Why not?  If you wish to have this rough sketch turned into your original character, for the prices mentioned above, please take a moment to read the rule/other info section of this description.
Thanks for checking it out!

Oh... That can be either spit, or blood, or green radioactive chemicals, or whatever. It's up to you
I don't mind drawing up a bit of blood.
And your character doesn't have to be a werewolf to be used in this. Any wolf/wolf like canine will do. ;D

I'm thinking, maybe it will turn out like this image. If ye'd like. In terms of detailing and or outlining. (if you choose for it to be outlined. Smoke not included. Unless maybe you want smoke? )


RULES! / OTHER INFO!
----> please read these before making an offer! <----

  Paypal money offer only please. USD dollars. Please do not offer me DA points. I have very little use for them these days. If I want points, I will offer a point commission.

What is a Y.C.H. Commission?
Your Character Here Commission
Well, I draw a sketch, upload it, you decide if you like it enough to pay me to turn it into your original character, I edit it, and or finish it (if you wanna keep it as a sketch, polished sketch, or fully finished picture is up to you, and what you're willing to pay for.) And BOOM. You got yourself a commission/picture!

(Okay....not that I think this is going to happen....) But please, no arguing in the comments section.

This is NOT first come first served. I will choose whose character to draw.

Only YOUR OWN original character please . Nothing that belongs to, or are linked to an existing trademark/copyrighted concept that is owned by a company/person that you are not connected to. Please, just your own original character.
(No characters from movies, TV shows, anime, manga, video games, comics, books, music, music videos, etc... Or character based on any of those things)


  Please provide a link to your character, so I may see what you want me to draw before I choose or attempt your character/you for the commission. I need to make sure, that I can draw the character, not only in skill, but in Copyright issues as well.You can link to several references if you want. Again, this is not first come first serve.
And please, ONLY LINK HERE. Do not send me a note. Please just link in this comments section. So I can keep track of everything. LOL

Please only offer to buy the commission if you can pay right away, or within 3 days of the offer. I will not start the drawing, or upload it, until I receive the full payment. If you take longer than the 3 days, I will message you, asking about the payment. And we will come to a decision as to whether or not we will still be in business together.

  If you are the one to buy the commission. You are buying my time to draw the picture, but may not re-sell the picture. You can use it for profiles, RPs, icons, etc... But please do not claim it as your own, and please link back to the original if you use it elsewhere. And do not use it for monetary gain. You do not have my permission to make money off of it.

If you are NOT the person that buys the commission slot..... You have no rights to the image at all, unless I, or the commissioner, give you permission to use it. However, again though, not for monetary gain. If you wish to use the image, you must ask both of us or either of us. Please respect the artists.

The style of the character will be of my cartoony/realism mixed style. Or whatever the heck this style is.
 
Some things in the image may be subject to change in terms of the pose. I may move/extend a limb, or fix anatomy errors. Along with altering the sketch to become your character.





This is a "Your Character Here Commission" sketch, a drawing that will be turned into a commission. You do not have my permission to finish/alter/use this  sketch/image in any way shape or form. Please be Respectful to the artist(s), You are not permitted to use this image(s) or character(s) for role-playing, copying, tracing, basing, profile images, icons, sales, commercial use, etc...


Before you ask me for a commission/anything, please go to my main page to see if I am open for what you want. My Art Status/info is in the upper left corner, in my "Featured Deviation" widget. Also you will see my prices, as well as a link to a journal with my Terms Of Service.

item.title: Last Dance
item.description:
Pin-It

She knelt in the dirt before him. Feeling the chill of the clay through the knees of her jeans.

His golden eyes observed her, fathomless, a devourer transcendent of hunger or cruelty. He simply watched and waited, as if he knew why she had come.

She unfastened the buttons of her shirt, one by one, slowly, a ritual she had practiced many times, many nights. She forced herself to breathe slowly now, in and out. In and out.

Her shirt at last parted open, and the warm skin of her navel trembled at the kiss of the death-cold air. She shrugged her shoulders free and slipped out of the shirt, pausing to fold it carefully. She straightened the collar, feeling the grain of the cotton threads beneath her fingertips. Every sense of her body tightened now to a burning focus.

The scent of rotting vegetation, sickly sweet, filled her lungs. In and out. In and out.

Her next breath came too quickly as her insides twisted with mingled fear and anticipation. She squeezed her thighs together and balled her fists, her nails biting into the palms of her hands. She found her calm again in his golden eyes, and the fluttering qualms of mortal terror soon passed.

She brushed her sweat-damp hair from her eyes and smiled again as she breathed deeply, smelling his dry musk in the air. In and out. In and out.

She cupped her breasts in her hands, feeling her nipples, hard and sensitive now, through the silk of her bra. With deliberate slowness, she reached back and unclasped the tiny hooks, freeing her heaving breasts from their silken bondage.

She folded the bra and laid it neatly atop the shirt on the ground beside her.

She straightened her back and faced him again, her hands at her sides. His body tensed and shifted slightly as his eyes surveyed her bared chest.

She let her own gaze fall to her pointed nipples, rising and falling atop their pale mounds of soft flesh in desperate anticipation of what was to come. No, they belonged to him now, the first of the many gifts she presented to him, her devourer, her master.

He tensed again as she stood slowly. He shifted one great coil of his tail to block her escape, but she made no move to run.

Her lips parted slightly. She was panting softly now, hardly able to control herself. She had feared that she might try to run when the moment came, and she imagined the sudden weight of him upon her back as he seized her, crushing out her life before he consumed her body. The thought made the ache in her loins return seven-fold, and she doubled over in a groaning shudder.

He had blocked the exit completely with his body now, still watching her, content in the knowledge that she belonged to him now. He seemed in no hurry to feed, and she thanked him with a silent, trembling smile.

Her hiking boots now faced her, side by side, next to the shirt and bra. She felt the dampness of the clay through the soles of her socks. How long before all that remained of her was the clay itself, cold and lifeless? She would remain with him forever, another lump of the clay that formed his earthen throne upon which he would lay, dreaming through the long centuries.

Would he remember her taste when civilization lay in ruins?

She peeled her jeans, slowly down her long legs, savoring their warmth for the last time. She stepped out of them and folded them gently, her palm lingering on the warm, damp mound of denim that had covered her burning sex. Her own musk now mingled with the scent of the snake in the air.

She laid the jeans beside the shirt on the ground. She no longer thought of them as her belongings. They were human things, and she had shed that identity the moment she had set foot into his domain. She was his now, prey and sustenance, nothing more.

She heard him moving toward her now, ready to claim his offering.

She turned to face him. Her hands explored her body, feeling each part, making herself ready for him. Her middle finger probed between her lips, stroked and moistened by her tongue. She ran her fingertip across her teeth, imagining what it would be like for him to take her in. What would his teeth feel like upon her soft, helpless flesh? Would he be gentle, or cruel?

Her lethal curiosity would not go long unsatisfied.

She stepped forward and lay herself down across one of his coils.

“Take me,” she whispered as he opened his jaws above her head.

As she felt his heat close around her face, she could no longer control her breathing, but then there was no further need to now. A whimpering moan escaped her lips as he took the light from her, and she felt the first pricks of his needle-like teeth in the yielded flesh of her naked breasts.

Her shaking hand slipped down between her legs as she gave her body to him. Her finger found the quivering source of her ultimate surrender, and her muffled cries of terminal passion became the music for this, her last dance.

item.title: B5 Kudu Twins
item.description:
Pin-It

The sun had begun dipping below the horizon as Jon dropped his pack and perched on a jutting rock formation. The sky turned a deep red orange as the clouds rolled in dumping heavy rain upon the landscape. The river which marked the border of the reserve gleamed like a vein of hot silver off in to the distance in the last rays of the sun. Jon pulled out his binoculars and began surveying the landscape. As he observed from his position his two partners strode up behind him. 2 Kudu bull drones, Anengoni and Buumi, took up position behind him and began surveying the expanse sweeping with their sensors while networking with other drones in the area.

A rash of poaching had occurred in the area near the river. There were no access roads nor villages near this section of the park and the crocs did a great job of deterring would be poachers from crossing the river. This was not enough to deter all poachers though and recently a handful had succeeded. Jon gave them credit for braving the crocodiles but his admiration stopped there. Calling in his arrival to Ranger HQ he settled in and watched the sun set. His night patrol was about to begin and he would need his wits about him. The Bush held many surprises for both friend and foe alike.

–
Kudu Drones. While formidable in appearance Kudu drones are typically used for reconnaissance and observation. Theirs horns are long and can pierce most body armor, drone armor, and thin vehicle plating but they will only engage in combat as a last resort. Swift, graceful, and alert they are the perfect eyes and ears for any ranger or research operation.

item.title: B5 Sable Twins
item.description:
Pin-It
For a split second time slowed to a crawl as Natalie Mbotho exploded from the low brush to ambush her prey, a band of poachers roving through the park. Low hanging branches scratched at her skin as she rushed through the Bush, a carbon blade machete in each hand. She was immediately out paced by her twin partners, Mlungisi and Mondli, two proud grizzled Sable drones. Their curved horns caught the moonlight giving them the appearance of great sickles cutting through the night as they charged ahead.

She was a rogue, a vigilante, as they spoke of her and her colleagues on the encrypted ranger frequencies. Once a ranger herself, she had grown tired of seeing the poached animals, the corruption, and the poachers walking away free. Seeking to make a difference Natalie went off the grid and took the fight directly to the source busting small poaching groups and anonymously reporting animal sightings to anyone who would listen. 

Everything changed when the twins found her. They represented a greater power at work within the reserve, a spirit within that wanted to fight back and protect the animals they represented. They were looking for a kindred soul to fight with them. Two years ago she was recruited and she smiled at the thought of it, the wind rushing rushing past her face as she sprang in to join the only fight that really mattered to her.

item.title: NeoKingston
item.description:
Pin-It
Track for this picture : soundcloud.com/state-azure/sen…

FRENCH : Vers la fin du 21ème siècle, la fulgurante montée des eaux sur Terre obligea 4 millions de jamaïcains à quitter leur île natale pour s'intégrer dans les différents continents de l'époque. Six siècles plus tard, la première ville nomade mise en service fut baptisée NeoKingston en mémoire de la ville engloutie du même nom sur Terre.
Avec ses gigantesques structures magnétiques, Neo Kingston se déplace constamment sur différentes zones stratégiques de la planète Gliese 832C. L'avantage de ce type de structures permets d'éviter d'assécher les ressources environnantes en déplaçant la ville dès qu'un seuil de pollution approche d'un niveau critique. Au delà de son aspect technique, NeoKingston tente actuellement une renaissance de la culture rastafari, mais ce type de tradition semble peu compatible avec les nombreux détecteurs de fumée présents dans toute la ville.

ENGLISH :
In the end of the 21st century, the meteoric rise of water on Earth forced 4 million os Jamaicans to flee their native island to fit into the different continents. Six centuries later, the first nomadic city commissioned was named NeoKingston in memory of the sunken city on Earth.
With its huge magnetic structures, NeoKingston constantly moves on different strategic areas of the planet Gliese 832C. The advantage of such structures allow to avoid draining the surrounding resources by moving the city as soon as a pollution threshold approaching a critical level. Beyond its technical aspect, NeoKingston is attempting a rebirth of the Rastafarian culture, but this type of tradition seems hardly compatible with the many smoke detectors present in the whole city.

item.title: Anunnaki designs
item.description:
Pin-It

As promised, the Anunnaki aliens.

They are said to be one of the oldest and most advanced races in the universe, and responsible for creating other races that look like them, like humans, tall whites and nordics. They created these races to be their slaves, so even though they've left us, they expect complete submission from us should they ever return. It's also not unusual to see nordic aliens in the company of Anunnaki as personal slaves, but the nordics accept this as their destiny as a thanks to the Anunnaki for creating them. Tall whites on the other hand are attempting to break out of this arrangement and are trying to scheme with humans to end it, just waiting for us to become more powerful allies.

I decorated them with lots of gold because they are apparently obsessed with it, and it's a big motivator for them to visit other planets. (Mind you, the Anunnaki is not a cruel race and doesn't leave the planets they visit or the races they create devastated. The new races are given knowledge and means to survive on their own and allowed to evolve and expand to other planets)

For my version of the Nordics, go here humoncomics.com/nordic-alien-d…
